label: 唐草
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 56th  . Nara National Museum . 2004
説明文: This pattern of floral scrolls or rhythmically scrolling vines is also found in ancient Egypt and Mesopotamia and entered Japan via the Silk Road. The popular grape arabesque and peony arabesque either have the flowers facing alternate directions, or all the flowers oriented in the same direction.
